remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties> class contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> for the tip and barrel buttons on a tablet pen. Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty.Id%2A> property to get the GUID associated with a button.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonState> of the `barrel button`.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs" id="Snippet23"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb" id="Snippet23":::
